verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] asking the Supreme Court to let it enforce new conditions on grant funding for every " sanctuary city " except Chicago . Solicitor General Noel Francisco on Monday submitted a request to Justice Elena Kagan seeking a stay of the Chicago - based 7th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals ruling that blocked the administration from en ...
